borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Excavation of the rear garden to form a lightwell, further excavation underneath the front part of the basement in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement, alterations and enlargement of the front lightwell; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level at the rear of the property; demolition of the main roof and replacement with a new roof together with new rooflights in the front roofslope, 1no rooflight and 3no air conditioning units above the main flat roof at roof level, and replacement of 3no dormer windows with an enlarged dormer window in the rear roofslope; installation of new dormer windows to replace the existing dormer windows at second floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of the front, rear and side windows with triple glazed white timber window; infilling of 1no window at ground floor level to the side elevation; alterations to the roof and rear elevation of the ground floor back addition to include the installation of new rooflights and new door openings to replace the existing to the rear elevation; increasing the height of the front garden wall to 1m high.
